channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: pyproject-flake8 (5.0.4.post1)
item.description: pyproject-flake8 (`pflake8`), a monkey patching wrapper to connect flake8 with pyproject.toml configuration
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-markdown (0.4)
item.description: Lints Python code blocks in Markdown files using flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (22.9.11)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: pyproject-flake8 (5.0.4)
item.description: pyproject-flake8 (`pflake8`), a monkey patching wrapper to connect flake8 with pyproject.toml configuration
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-cached (0.1)
item.description: A wrapper around flake8's cli that uses cache at file level
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-junit (0.1.1)
item.description: JUnit assert statement checker plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-trio (22.9.1)
item.description: A highly opinionated flake8 plugin for Trio-related problems.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-for-pycharm (0.4.1)
item.description: Add flake8 support to pycharm. See README for how to use.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-requirements (1.6.2)
item.description: Package requirements checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: thonnyflake8 (1.0.3.post0)
item.description: A plugin that adds flake8 to the Thonny python IDE.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (2.1.3)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (22.8.2)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi files.

item.title: New: flake8-forelse (1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin which checks the use of for-else and while-else
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-ejudge (0.5.3)
item.description: Проверка стиля и требований к используемому синтаксису в python коде для ejudge
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-unused-fixtures (0.3.1)
item.description: Warn about unnecessary fixtures in tests' definition.
